Articles.Content:
months ago i was flying a battleship i built in a 5km orbit around minmus (Extremely cl0se you can see the rocks!) An i saw a mountain approaching with one of my bases on it (I had built that base on the mountain earlier) i could literally see the base! So i aimed by ship down at the surface and fired, Less then a second later i saw my kinetic missile explode against the surface.

Minmus is great!!

Now replicate this on Tylo!
What about Gilly? But edit its gravity so it's a Tylo-Gravity Asteroid!
